source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_SEQ_00<tab>Beneath Ronitt's thick beard hides a self-satisfied grin.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_SEQ_00Règle spéciale:  synchronisation de quête avec limitation de job ou de classe

Ronitt est visiblement très fier de son char.

source:
TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_SEQ_01The newly completed Rolling Tankard prototype has been put through its paces, and a lack of screaming and charred earth indicates the final test run was successful. The next step is to produce more tanks, and for that, Ronitt requires a larger workshop. He calls a meeting with the other members of Watts's Anvil, but their talks are interrupted by the sudden appearance of Chief Xamott of the Tholl and Chief Glagg of the Gogg. Quite how these archrivals suffered each other's company long enough to reach Lakeland is unclear, but their ire for Ronitt and Ozogg's disobedience is palpable. Not only have aspiring inventors broken the strict code of their respective tribes, but they have each been accused of perpetrating heinous crimes. Ozogg of sharing Gogg technology with the Tholl, and Ronitt of stealing Watts's designs without permission, an act punishable by banishment. Although Ronitt is able to convince his chief of the importance of the Rolling Tankards, he is given an ultimatum: complete five tanks by the next Beardtide festival or he and the other Tholls will be sent back to Tomra. What's more, he must forfeit Watts's hammer should he fail. Such a grim prospect fails to dampen his determination, and he readily accepts the wager.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_SEQ_01* Cette quête est  synchronisée avec votre niveau.
* Il n'est possible de progresser dans cette quête qu'avec la classe ou le job qui a servi à la commencer.

Votre réunion du jour a été interrompue par l'arrivée d'un duo de choc: Xamott et Glagg, doyens respectifs des Tholl et des Gogg! Comme de juste, Xamott a vertement réprimandé Ronitt, l'accusant d'enfreindre la règle qui interdit aux Tholl de reprendre les travaux de l'illustre Watts. L'adolescent s'est toutefois défendu de toute mauvaise intention, et a finalement convaincu son doyen de lui accorder le bénéfice du doute, sous la forme d'un défi: ses camarades et lui devront construire cinq chars avant la fête dite de la “noue-barbe”, ou il se verra confisquer le marteau de Watts en guise de punition! Parlez à Ronitt après ce coup de tonnerre.

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_SEQ_02<tab>Ronitt has planned a number of improvements to Watts's Anvil, and he calls on your crafting skills once more. He even has the nerve to demand no less than absolute perfection despite the urgent need to complete the work as quickly as possible.
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_SEQ_02<tab>Malgré le couperet au-dessus de sa tête, Ronitt ne s'est pas démonté. Il vous a chargé<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> de l'aider à agrandir l'atelier du Garage Watts, en vue de lancer la production en série de l'automatank. Commencez par récupérer des matériaux auprès de l'automate ravitailleur.

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_SEQ_03<tab>After obtaining the necessary materials from inside the Fetchomatic Mechatoad, you put your mind to the task at hand.
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_SEQ_03<tab>Vous avez fait le plein de matériaux. Fabriquez à présent ce que Ronitt vous a demandé en haute qualité, et remettez-le-lui.

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_SEQ_04<tab>Though Ronitt expresses his thanks for your hard work, he is distracted by the absence of Ozogg, who he has not seen since the visit from their respective chiefs. He is perhaps a little too quick to point out his lack of concern for her well-being, stating he simply wishes to know if there is something that might present a problem. As she is unlikely to share her thoughts with a Tholl, he asks that you go and question her in his stead.
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_SEQ_04<tab>Si Ronitt a réaffirmé sa détermination, il s'est en revanche inquiété de l'étrange com<var 16 /var>por<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment de sa camarade des Gogg, craignant que sa “trahison” ne lui vaille un bannissement définitif de son clan. Aussi, il vous a <var 08 E905 ((envoyée)) ((envoyé)) /var> vous enquérir de ses états d'âme. Retrouvez Ozogg à la Garde de Radisca.

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_SEQ_05<tab>It seems Ozogg had only gone to survey the proposed site for the upcoming tank demonstration to ensure that nothing will prevent Ronitt from passing Xamott's test. With no prying eyes or ears to hear, she confesses her resolve to never return home, making any punishment from her elders─even the threat of banishment similar to Ronitt─a matter of little concern. All she cares about is carrying on with her engineering, which has been her lifelong passion. She then goes on to share her childhood memories of meeting Ronitt as a boy and their all-too-brief encounter and her giving him a Gogg coin as a token of their friendship. Though Ronitt was too young to remember, Ozogg has fond recollections of that day, and her work at Watts's Anvil reminds her of the simple joy of crafting that she felt all those years ago. Though she insists that she is only here to challenge Ronitt as rightful heir to Watts's hammer, it seems that this may be merely a pretext for her to spend time with like-minded individuals. As you have agreed not to relate her tale to Ronitt and the others, you decide to return to the Anvil and give a condensed and carefully selected account of your talk with Ozogg.
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_SEQ_05<tab>Ozogg vous a annoncé qu'elle allait tourner définitivement le dos aux Gogg afin de vivre sa passion de l'artisanat sans pression ni contraintes. Vous avez par ailleurs appris que Ronitt et elle s'étaient déjà croisés étant plus jeunes, le temps d'un agréable après-midi dont le jeune Tholl ne garde hélas aucun souvenir, si ce n'est une pièce que sa camarade lui avait alors offerte. Inquiète de la difficulté du défi des doyens, Ozogg a laissé entendre qu'elle allait “forcer la chance”... Après ce long échange, retournez au Garage Watts et parlez à Ronitt.

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_SEQ_06<tab>Your retelling of the conversation with Ozogg seems to appease Ronitt, whose main concern is whether she will continue to help with construction of the remaining Rolling Tankards. Now that the workshop is equipped for mass production, the dwarves face a race against time to complete the tanks before Beardtide arrives.
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_SEQ_06<tab>Rassuré quant au moral d'Ozogg, Ronitt a annoncé qu'il travaillerait nuit et jour pour construire ses cinq chars et remporter son pari. Seulement, la tâche s'annonce ô combien ardue... Le Garage Watts survivra-t-il à l'épreuve du feu<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_TODO_02<tab><var 08 E4E8050A ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> to Ronitt)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050B ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> to Ronitt)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050C ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> to Ronitt)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80509 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> to Ronitt)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050D ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> to Ronitt)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050E ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> to Ronitt)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050F ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> to Ronitt)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80510 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> to Ronitt)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_000<tab>I've been puttin' the prototype through its paces, doin' a bit of fine-tunin' along the way. I'm happy to say it's now complete!
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! Avec toutes les améliorations qu'on a apportées à l'automatank, je me dis qu'il serait grand temps de lui offrir son premier tour de chauffe<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_001<tab>I reckon I probably could've done it all by myself eventually, but havin' everyone else chip in with the work definitely helped.
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_001<tab>À bien y repenser, c'est incroyable qu'on ait pu réunir tous ces gens, tous ces talents différents dans un but commun... Il est loin, le temps où je bricolais seul dans mon coin<var 1D /var>!

source:
TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_002If we keep this up, Watts's Anvil will be able to achieve “world domination through technology”!
Hmm... Might need to work on the slogan a bit.
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_002<tab>Plus que jamais, j'ai envie d'aller jusqu'au bout, de changer le monde aux côtés de mes frères et sœurs du Garage Watts<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_003<tab>All right, if we're gonna produce more Rollin' Tankards, we'll need to find a way to speed up the process. Time for a meetin'!
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_003<tab>Mais pour l'heure, il faut surtout qu'on voie comment produire l'automatank en série... C'est parti pour une petite réunion stratégique<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_004<tab>We're almost ready to take over─I mean, “save” the world with our tanks!
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_004<tab>Salut les barbus<var 1D /var>! J'espère que vous êtes chauds, car à partir de maintenant, on va lancer l'automatank à l'assaut de Norvrandt tout entier<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_OZOGG_000_005<tab>I hope you haven't forgotten about what's in store for you once they're finished.
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_OZOGG_000_005<tab>Hé<var 1D /var>! Et ta promesse, alors<var 1D /var>!? T'avais dit qu'une fois le prototype opérationnel, t'accepterais de me déf...

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_100_005<tab>'Course not! But in the meantime, I've got bigger fish to fry.
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_100_005<tab>Ouais, ouais, je sais<var 1D /var>! Mais j'ai d'autres chars à fouetter là, tu comprends... (grommelle)

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_XAMOTT_000_006<tab>(-???-)You, boy! What the bloody hells do you think you're playin' at, consortin' with Goggs! Bunch of stinkin' scruffybeards, the lot of 'em!
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_XAMOTT_000_006<tab>(-???-)J'en reviens pas<var 1D /var>! Même de l'autre côté de la Fracture, il faut que je tombe sur ta vieille barbe en carton<var 1D /var>! Bouge de là, l'odeur de soufre de tes poils m'irrite les naseaux<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_GLAGG_000_007<tab>(-???-)Watch your tongue, Xamott, or I'll pull it out with my pliers!
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_GLAGG_000_007<tab>(-???-)TOI, bouge de là<var 1D /var>! T'arrêtes pas de me coller depuis t'à l'heure<var 1D /var>! Tu veux me refiler tes poux de barbe ou quoi<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_008<tab>Hob's balls, it's the chief!
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_008<tab>Vingt-deux, v'là le doyen<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_OZOGG_000_009<tab>Gah! And my chief's here, too!
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_OZOGG_000_009<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Les<var 1A 01 /var> doyens<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_XAMOTT_000_010<tab>So this is where you young'uns have been all this time... Explain yourselves, and spare me any limp-bearded excuses! Wait, what is <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var>!?
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_XAMOTT_000_010<tab>Alors les morveux, on quitte le village sans prévenir<var 1D /var>? Heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment que votre doyen a des yeux et des oreilles partout<var 1D /var>! Maintenant, restez tranquilles et montrez-moi un peu ce que vous mijotez...

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_011<tab>Behold, the Rollin' Tankard! One of the lost designs of the great Watts, in the flesh! Well, “in the metal,” I suppose, but the point still stands!
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_011<tab>Hé hé... Alors Doyen Xamott, qu'est-ce que vous dites de notre automatank<var 1D /var>? Avouez qu'il en jette<var 1D /var>! C'est Watts qui l'a imaginé, mais c'est nous qui l'avons construit<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_GLAGG_000_012<tab>Yes, but what the bloody hells <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var> it?
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_GLAGG_000_012<tab>Qu-que... Qu'avez-vous fait, cornegidouille<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_XAMOTT_000_013<tab>Never mind that, what I want to know is how you got your grubby little mitts on Watts's designs? They were locked in an unbreakable safe!
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_XAMOTT_000_013<tab>Comment est-ce possible<var 1D /var>!? Les croquis de Watts étaient planqués dans une boîte quasi impossible à ouvrir<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_014<tab>Unbreakable? Don't think so, Chief. I opened that back when I was a nipper. And I thought, it's “finders keepers,” so I helped myself to the plans inside.
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_014<tab>La boîte casse-tête<var 1D /var>? J'ai trouvé la solution quand j'étais p'tit. C'était pas dur... Depuis, je garde toujours les plans sur moi au cas où<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_XAMOTT_000_015<tab>You did what!?
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_XAMOTT_000_015<tab>Mais quel abruti<var 1D /var>!!!

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_XAMOTT_000_016<tab>Taking such revered artifacts without permission is strictly forbidden! I should banish the bloody lot of you!
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_XAMOTT_000_016<tab>Tout Tholl qui se respecte sait qu'il est formellement interdit de lorgner les travaux de Watts<var 1D /var>! Tu viens de transgresser allègrement l'un de nos plus grands tabous<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_017<tab>Steady on, Chief! I didn't even realize it was against the rules!
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_017<tab>Qu-qu-quoi<var 1D /var>!? J'ai jamais entendu parler de ça, moi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_GLAGG_000_018<tab>As for you, young lady, you'd better have a damned good excuse for this behavior. And I notice that ethanol mill over there is of Gogg design. If I find you've been sharin' our secrets with the Tholl, your life won't be worth livin'!
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_GLAGG_000_018<tab>Et toi, Ozogg... Je t'y prends, à t'encanailler avec nos ennemis, à leur révéler nos secrets de fabrication les mieux gardés... Tu sais pourtant bien que c'est contraire à la loi des Gogg<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_XAMOTT_000_019<tab>You can't go replicatin' Watts's ideas willy-nilly. For all we know, this could bring about the destruction of Tomra! In any event, his great works are far beyond the capabilities of you whelps!
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_XAMOTT_000_019<tab>Les inventions de Watts sont loin d'être simples à réaliser. La moindre erreur peut nous coûter TRÈS cher<var 1D /var>! Ce n'est pas un défi à la portée de minots comme vous. Dans cent ans peut-être, et encore<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_XAMOTT_000_020<tab>And to make matters worse, the Gogg know all about it now! What's to stop them from buildin' their own tanks and wagin' war on us!?
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_XAMOTT_000_020<tab>En plus, vous coopérez avec une Gogg... Alors là, c'est la totale<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_KARUTT_000_021<tab>I-I don't like the s-sound of that...
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_KARUTT_000_021<tab>Ronitt...

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_REGITT_000_022<tab>Maybe this weren't such a good idea after all...
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_REGITT_000_022<tab>On a vraiment fait quelque chose de mal, tu crois<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_023<tab>Stop snivelin', you two! Why would Watts design somethin' like this if he didn't want anyone to make it!? We're carryin' on his legacy!
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_023<tab>T-trop pas<var 1D /var>! Notre char est exactement comme Watts l'avait imaginé<var 1D /var>: beau, performant, sûr... et bientôt utile à tous les habitants de Norvrandt<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_OZOGG_000_024<tab>If taking the plans is against the rules, why did no one here know about it? Surely someone would've said something to Ronitt if it's that severe a crime.
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_OZOGG_000_024<tab>C'est pas pour dire, mais comment ça se fait que personne ici ne soit au courant de vos règles<var 1D /var>? Vous êtes sûr d'avoir bien fait votre boulot de doyen<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_XAMOTT_000_025<tab>W-Well, you'd think that bein' in a locked safe would be enough of a deterrent, but obviously not! Bugger my beard, do I have to spell everythin' out? ...Truth be told, I never thought anyone would break the soddin' lock like that.
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_XAMOTT_000_025<tab>J'avoue, c'est en partie ma faute... J'aurais dû insister sur le caractère défendu de l'héritage de Watts. Seulement, j'avais peur que ça attise la curiosité de certains. Et pour être honnête, je me doutais pas qu'un môme parviendrait à ouvrir la boîte...

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_026<tab>I didn't mean no harm by it, honest! Maybe if I explain <var 1A 02 /var>why<var 1A 01 /var> I wanted to build Watts's tank, you'll understand...
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_026<tab>Doyen Xamott, vous devez me faire confiance pour une fois<var 1D /var>! Laissez-moi vous expliquer pourquoi on tient tant à construire l'automatank...

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_XAMOTT_000_027<tab>Hmm... You're cleverer than you look, Ronitt. I suppose it's no good havin' all that technology if we're the only ones who benefit from it.
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_XAMOTT_000_027<tab>... J'ai bien capté le message. Vous voulez mettre l'héritage de Watts au service du plus grand nombre. C'est louable... Sauf que parfois, toute la bonne volonté du monde suffit pas.

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_XAMOTT_000_028<tab>But let's make one thing clear: if you go producin' a load of shoddy work, the Tholl will be the laughingstock of Norvrandt. Do you swear on Watts's beard that you'll do a proper job of it?
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_XAMOTT_000_028<tab>Si vous comptez vraiment équiper tout Norvrandt, vous allez devoir assembler des chars à la chaîne, tout en veillant à maintenir une qualité irréprochable. Vous pensez en être capables, bande de moules<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_029<tab>(-Ronitt and Ozogg-)We will!
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_029<tab>(-Ronitt et Ozogg-)Un peu qu'on en est capables<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_XAMOTT_000_030<tab>To prove that you can produce quality <var 1A 02 /var>and<var 1A 01 /var> quantity, I want you to complete five tanks by the next Beardtide festival. Think you can manage that?
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_XAMOTT_000_030<tab>Dans ce cas, construisez-moi cinq chars d'ici la prochaine fête de la noue-barbe. Cinq, pas un de moins<var 1D /var>! Et le tout en parfait état de marche. Compris<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_031<tab>(-Ronitt and Ozogg-)Yes!
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_031<tab>(-Ronitt et Ozogg-)Compris<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_XAMOTT_000_032<tab>Should you fail, every Tholl here will be sent straight back to Tomra. And that's not all! Ronitt must return Watts's hammer. Those are my conditions. Don't disappoint me!
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_XAMOTT_000_032<tab>Cochon qui s'en dédit, les morveux<var 1D /var>! Si j'ai pas mes cinq chars en temps et en heure, et d'une, je vous renvoie de force chez vos mamans, et de deux, je vous confisque le marteau de Watts<var 1D /var>! Ça vous passera l'envie de faire les malins<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_033<tab>Hmph! We'll be holding a demonstration at the bottom of that hill over there on Beardtide! Just you see!
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_033<tab>Mgngnnn... Même pas peur<var 1D /var>! Rendez-vous à la Garde de Radisca, au premier jour de la fête... Vous verrez, vous allez manger votre casque<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_034<tab>Only five by Beardtide? Ha! Why not make it ten? Challenge accepted!
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_034<tab>Ça va aller<var 1D /var>! Cinq chars, c'est quoi<var 1D /var>? Trois fois rien si on s'y met tout de suite<var 1D /var>! Allez les amis, au boulot<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_OZOGG_000_035<tab>Erm, Ronitt...
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_OZOGG_000_035<tab>Ronitt, attends<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_OZOGG_000_036<tab>I've got something to take care of! But I'll be back soon!
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_OZOGG_000_036<tab>Je vais aller à la Garde de Radisca faire, hum... du repérage... entre autres... T'inquiète, je reviens dans pas longtemps<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_037<tab>Hmm? Suit yourself.
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_037<tab>Euh... OK, reviens vite<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_040<tab>The more I think about it, the more it pisses me off!
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_040<tab>Grrrrr...<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_041<tab>The only reason the chief is givin' me such a hard time about this is because he reckons I'm not up to the task!
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_041<tab>Ils m'ont énervé, ces vieux réacs, avec leur prêchi-prêcha... Ils nous prennent pour des branquignols ou quoi<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_042<tab>I've also got a sneakin' suspicion he made up that rule and Watts's plans just to make my life miserable. He can't bear the thought of me showin' him up with my engineerin'!
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_042<tab>Les règles, toujours les règles... Comme si y avait que ça dans la vie<var 1D /var>! Moi je dis, quand on a la passion et l'envie de créer, y a pas de règle qui tienne<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_043<tab>It looks like the only thing for it is to get those tanks built, on the double. You see, Beardtide takes place roughly once a year, when it's time for the chief of Tomra to have his beard washed.
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_043<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, désolé de t'impliquer dans tout ça, mais j'ai besoin que tu m'aides à leur clouer le bec<var 1D /var>! Pour l'honneur du Garage Watts<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_044<tab>Judgin' by the state of it, I'd say we don't have long left. We need to have as many people workin' on the tanks as possible, and that means makin' the workshop a lot bigger.
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_044<tab>La noue-barbe débute lorsque la barbe du vieux Xamott a atteint une certaine longueur. Ça veut dire qu'on n'a pas beaucoup de temps... Faut qu'on se dépêche d'agrandir notre atelier pour pouvoir produire les chars en série.

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_045<tab>'Course, I've already come up with a plan, but I need you to bring me some supplies. And this time, only your very best work will do. Got that?
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_045<tab>Voilà ce que tu vas faire<var 1D /var>: tu vas nous fabriquer des plaques de tôle de qualité supérieure, du genre qui résiste aux fortes vibrations.

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_046<tab>'Course, I've already come up with a plan, but I need you to bring me some supplies. And this time, only your very best work will do. Got that?
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_046<tab>Voilà ce que tu vas faire<var 1D /var>: tu vas nous fabriquer du matériel de con<var 16 /var>struc<var 16 /var>tion de qualité supérieure, du genre qui résiste aux fortes vibrations.

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_047<tab>'Course, I've already come up with a plan, but I need you to bring me some supplies. And this time, only your very best work will do. Got that?
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_047<tab>Voilà ce que tu vas faire<var 1D /var>: tu vas nous concocter des substances explosives de haute qualité. Ça nous permettra de déblayer le terrain.

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_048<tab>You'll find everythin' you need in the Mechatoad.
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_048<tab>Oublie pas de passer voir l'automate ravitailleur pour les matériaux. Merci d'avance<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_049<tab>I suppose you're wonderin' why it's called the Fetchomatic Mechatoad? Well, it fetches all the materials we could possibly need automatically, and it's also a mechanical toad. Comin' up with great names is just one of my many talents, you know!
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_049<tab>Pas maintenant, je bosse<var 1D /var>! Si c'est des matériaux que tu veux, l'automate ravitailleur est ton ami<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_050<tab>I suppose you're wonderin' why it's called the Fetchomatic Mechatoad? Well, it fetches all the materials we could possibly need automatically, and it's also a mechanical toad. Comin' up with great names is just one of my many talents, you know!
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_050<tab>Pas maintenant, je bosse<var 1D /var>! Si c'est des matériaux que tu veux, l'automate ravitailleur est ton ami<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_051<tab>I suppose you're wonderin' why it's called the Fetchomatic Mechatoad? Well, it fetches all the materials we could possibly need automatically, and it's also a mechanical toad. Comin' up with great names is just one of my many talents, you know!
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_051<tab>Pas maintenant, je bosse<var 1D /var>! Si c'est des matériaux que tu veux, l'automate ravitailleur est ton ami<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_AUTOMATON_000_052<tab><bloop> <beep>
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_AUTOMATON_000_052<tab>(cliquette) (grince)

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_AUTOMATON_000_053<tab><bloop> <beep>
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_AUTOMATON_000_053<tab>(cliquette) (grince)

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_AUTOMATON_000_054<tab><bloop> <beep>
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_AUTOMATON_000_054<tab>(cliquette) (grince)

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_AUTOMATON_000_055<tab><beep> Request for materials acknowledged.
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_AUTOMATON_000_055<tab>(cliquette) Il vous manque des matériaux<var 1D /var>? J'en ai plein la panse<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_AUTOMATON_000_056<tab><beep> Request for materials acknowledged.
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_AUTOMATON_000_056<tab>(cliquette) Il vous manque des matériaux<var 1D /var>? J'en ai plein la panse<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_AUTOMATON_000_057<tab><beep> Request for ingredients acknowledged.
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_AUTOMATON_000_057<tab>(cliquette) Il vous manque des matériaux<var 1D /var>? J'en ai plein la panse<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_060<tab>I assume you got there in the end?
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_060<tab>T'as fini<var 1D /var>? Génial, fais voir ce que t'as fabriqué<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_061<tab>Bugger m─ Ahem! Oh yes, very good, except for this, ah...slight impurity here. It should suffice, though.
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_061<tab>C'est du beau boulot de ta part. Comme d'hab', j'ai envie de dire<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_062<tab>Ha ha, just jokin'! It's damn near perfect! This'll go a long way in makin' the workshop bigger and better than ever.
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_062<tab>Allez, courage... On va y arriver, tous ensemble<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_063<tab>One thing's botherin' me, though. I haven't seen Ozogg since she wandered off. I heard from one of the others she was loiterin' by somethin' called Radisca's Round.
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_063<tab>Au fait, Ozogg avait pas l'air dans son assiette... Entre nous, je m'en veux un peu de l'avoir mêlée à tout ça...

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_064<tab>Since Chief Xamott almost bloody well banished me for takin' Watts's plans, I reckon an even harsher punishment's in store for Ozogg. I mean, I bet their chief didn't take too kindly to her givin' away their secrets and buildin' us an ethanol mill!
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_064<tab>Pour nous encore, ça va. Le vieux Xamott devrait pas trop nous en vouloir d'avoir enfreint la loi des Tholl... Pour Ozogg, par contre... Après le coup du nano-éthanol, je suis pas sûr que les Gogg veuillent encore d'elle...

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_065<tab>Now, I know what you're thinkin': “Look at that daft sod Ronitt, worryin' about a Gogg.” Well, I ain't! I just...wanna know if there's somethin' I <var 1A 02 /var>should<var 1A 01 /var> be worried about, which isn't the same thing at all!
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_065<tab>S-si ça se trouve, elle est partie chialer dans son coin parce qu'elle sait qu'elle est bannie<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_066<tab>Even if there was, I doubt she'd tell me or any of the other Tholls, so maybe you could have a word with her?
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_066<tab>Tu veux pas aller la voir, s'te plaît<var 1D /var>? Elle fait partie de la bande, faut pas l'abandonner<var 1D /var>! Et elle pourra se confier à toi plus facilement comme t'appartiens à aucun clan.

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_067<tab>Thanks, 'preciate it. If you could find out what her chief said, and if it's any cause for concern, it'd go a long way to puttin' my mind at ease.
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_067<tab>Merci, c'est sympa de ta part<var 1D /var>! Ozogg est partie faire un tour à la Garde de Radisca, je crois. Rattrape-la tant qu'il est temps<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_068<tab>
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_068<tab>

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_OZOGG_000_070<tab>Oh, it's you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Is something the matter?
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_OZOGG_000_070<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>? Qu'est-ce que tu fais là<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_OZOGG_000_071<tab>Hahaha! Ronitt sent you to check up on me? Maybe he doesn't despise me as much as he'd have everyone believe! Ahahaha!
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_OZOGG_000_071<tab>Pffouah ha ha ha<var 1D /var>! J'y crois pas, Ronitt qui se fait du mouron pour moi<var 1D /var>! Morte de rire<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_OZOGG_000_072<tab>Haha...ha... Oh dear, I haven't laughed that hard in a long time. If you must know, I didn't come down here to sulk, I just wanted to have a look around where the demonstration is due to take place.
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_OZOGG_000_072<tab>C'est tellement pas son genre... Rien que d'y penser, ça me fait marrer<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_OZOGG_000_073<tab>If anything ruins Ronitt's big day, I'll have to wait even longer to pit my skills against his!
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_OZOGG_000_073<tab>Comme je vous l'ai dit, je suis venue faire du repérage en préparation du jour J, rien de plus... Enfin, c'est plutôt aimable de sa part de penser à moi... Je dirais même plus, ça me touche<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_OZOGG_000_074<tab>But, if I'm being honest, there's a bit more to it than that. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, will you promise not to tell the others?
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_OZOGG_000_074<tab>Écoute, puisque t'as pris la peine de venir jusqu'ici... Tu veux que je te révèle un secret<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_OZOGG_000_075<tab>The truth is, I've no plans to return to Komra once this is all over. In fact, I'd already made that decision the day I left. So it makes no difference to whether I'm banished or not.
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_OZOGG_000_075<tab>En fait... j'ai aucune intention de rentrer chez les Gogg. Dès l'instant où j'ai quitté Kholusia, je savais que c'était pour de bon. Bref, Ronitt a vraiment pas à se culpabiliser pour ça.

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_OZOGG_000_076<tab>I couldn't care less what the chief or anyone else thinks about me, as long as I can carry on with my engineering. The feeling of having an idea and seeing it come to life right before your eyes... It's indescribable!
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_OZOGG_000_076<tab>Moi, je suis comme lui, j'adore fabriquer des trucs. Donner forme aux idées qu'on a en tête, y a que ça de vrai<var 1D /var>! À mes yeux, en tout cas.

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_OZOGG_000_077<tab>The thing is, as one of Watts's descendants, everyone has had such high expectations of me, even as a child. “Build this, build that. Craft me some copper rings. No, not those copper rings, the other sort.”
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_OZOGG_000_077<tab>Mais ça, les autres le comprennent pas... Pour eux, la descendante de Watts doit utiliser son talent pour construire des machines de guerre en priorité. Et tant pis si y a rien de plus barbant...

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_OZOGG_000_078<tab>When the pressure got too much, I'd sneak away from my teachers to play with the junk I'd collected from around the village.
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_OZOGG_000_078<tab>Quand j'étais p'tite, il m'arrivait souvent de quitter le village en douce pour aller glaner des vieilles bricoles à retaper. Faut dire qu'à l'époque, les querelles entre clans me passaient au-dessus de la tête.

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_OZOGG_000_079<tab>That's how I first met Ronitt. He was a few years younger than me─he still is, as far as I know─but just like me, he was picking up pieces of scrap metal and imagining all the things he could make from them.
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_OZOGG_000_079<tab>Un jour, alors que j'étais en train de trifouiller dans mon coin, un mioche est venu me voir. Il était un peu plus jeune que moi, et tout aussi passionné par les machines. Très vite, on s'est bien entendus tous les deux.

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_OZOGG_000_080<tab>When I went over to speak to him, I found we were as alike as two peas in a pod. He loved to make things just as much as I did, and in that brief time we spent together, we talked all about the ideas we'd had, and even made a sort of mechanical doll!
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_OZOGG_000_080<tab>On a passé le reste de la journée ensemble, à retourner des montagnes de ferraille, à s'échanger des idées d'inventions. On a même monté à quatre mains un pseudo-automate, comme ça, pour le plaisir, et le résultat était loin d'être à jeter<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_OZOGG_000_081<tab>As a sign of our newfound friendship, I gave him a Gogg coin, and promised that we'd meet again... But someone must've seen us. When I got back home to the village, my parents forbade me from playing with “that Tholl boy.”
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_OZOGG_000_081<tab>Au moment de nous séparer, j'ai offert au garçon une pièce gogg pour le remercier de m'avoir tenu compagnie. Puis je suis rentrée au village, où mes parents m'ont passé un savon en bonne et due forme. Je l'ai plus jamais revu après ça.

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_OZOGG_000_082<tab>And, well, that was the last I saw of him. He was so young, I doubt he remembers any of it, but I'll always cherish the memories of that day, that simple joy of making something for its own sake.
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_OZOGG_000_082<tab>Ce garçon... c'était Ronitt. Lui a p'têt oublié, mais moi, il m'arrive encore de repenser à cet après-midi, à la joie que j'ai ressentie... C'est dans ces moments-là que je me dis que les armes, c'est nul. Que moi, je veux construire des machines qui font rêver<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_OZOGG_000_083<tab>Seeing Ronitt and his friends working together reminded me of how I felt on that day. I'd rather be here helping them build something that will make a difference to the whole of Norvrandt than only doing what's best for the Gogg.
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_OZOGG_000_083<tab>Je suis bien contente de pouvoir être moi-même aujourd'hui. Ça me tue de l'admettre, mais tout ça, c'est grâce à Ronitt... et à vous, mes potes du Garage Watts<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_OZOGG_000_084<tab>Ahem! And once that's over and done with, I'll have a chance to prove that I'm a better engineer than Ronitt and claim Watts's hammer. For <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var> is my true objective, oh yes!
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_OZOGG_000_084<tab>Rien de rien... Non... Je ne regrette rien<var 1D /var>! Entre mon clan et ma passion, j'ai fait mon choix<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_OZOGG_000_085<tab>It's true! Well, I suppose I don't really <var 1A 02 /var>need<var 1A 01 /var> the hammer as such. I just thought a little competition would be healthy for the both of us.
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_OZOGG_000_085<tab>D-désolée, je me suis laissé emporter. C'est que tu fais <var 08 E905 ((une bonne confidente)) ((un bon confident)) /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_OZOGG_000_086<tab>Hmm... But I have the feeling that you're far too skilled to be taking orders from someone like Ronitt. Why are you helping him, anyway?
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_OZOGG_000_086<tab>Parle-moi un peu de toi, tiens. Pour arriver à ton niveau, t'as dû en baver des ronds de chapeau. C'est quoi, ta motivation première, celle qui te pousse à viser toujours plus haut<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_Q1_000_000<tab>Que répondez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_A1_000_001<tab>For the greater good!
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_A1_000_001<tab>Je veux aider mon prochain.

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_A1_000_002<tab>Wherever these talented hands are needed, I will be there.
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_A1_000_002<tab>J'aime mon métier.

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_A1_000_003<tab>Because there's money to be made. Presumably.
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_A1_000_003<tab>L'argent.

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_OZOGG_000_087<tab>Oh, how very noble! ...I'm being sarcastic, in case you hadn't noticed.
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_OZOGG_000_087<tab>Ah, je me reconnais dans ce que tu dis<var 1D /var>! C'est vrai que c'est gratifiant de voir le fruit de son travail utile à quelqu'un d'autre<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_OZOGG_000_088<tab>Well, if the staggering level of incompetence around Watts's Anvil is anything to go by, those talented hands of yours will find no shortage of work.
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_OZOGG_000_088<tab>Ça te fait un point commun avec Ronitt et moi<var 1D /var>! Autant te dire que tu viens de grimper dans mon estime<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_OZOGG_000_089<tab>I wouldn't get your hopes up. Ronitt may be surprised to find there is a lot less demand for his so-called masterpieces than he realizes. Besides, I don't recall him mentioning that <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> would receive any of the profits.
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_OZOGG_000_089<tab>Ha ha<var 1D /var>! Ça, c'est une réponse honnête<var 1D /var>! L'argent, hein... C'est vrai que c'est dur de vivre sa passion quand on n'a pas un rond. T'inquiète pas, va. Un talent comme le tien, y a forcément moyen de le monnayer <var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_OZOGG_000_090<tab>We all have our own reasons for being here, I suppose. And it's not like anyone is forcing us to do this. I'm just glad to have someone other than those boorish Tholls to speak to. I mean you, by the way.
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_OZOGG_000_090<tab>Ah, ça fait plaisir de discuter avec toi<var 1D /var>! Je vois pas le temps passer<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_OZOGG_000_091<tab>Honestly, I can't see how they get anything done over in Tomra. Did you see the way Ronitt let their chief talk him into that ridiculous ultimatum?
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_OZOGG_000_091<tab>N'empêche, les doyens ont pas été tendres avec Ronitt. Cinq chars... Même s'il trime à fond la caisse, ça va être compliqué de tenir les délais... À moins que... Hmm...

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_OZOGG_000_092<tab>If they don't get those tanks finished in time, that'll be the end of Watts's Anvil and everything I've worked for will go up in smoke. And worst of all, I'll never get the hammer if Ronitt loses it in this stupid wager!
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_OZOGG_000_092<tab>Ronitt a du talent, mais il est peut-être un peu trop honnête pour son bien... Il m'en voudra pas si je force un peu la chance à sa place...

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_OZOGG_000_093<tab>Luckily, I have a plan, but I'll need some time to mull over the finer points. For now, let's get back to the workshop.
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_OZOGG_000_093<tab>... Bien, bien, bien. Mon repérage est terminé, rentrons au Garage Watts<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_095<tab>So? What did she say?
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_095<tab>Ah, te revoilà<var 1D /var>! Des nouvelles d'Ozogg<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_096<tab>Hmm... She just went to look over the demonstration site? Seems she wants us to pass Chief Xamott's test, even if it's only for the chance to challenge me for Watts's hammer. Main thing is, she's stickin' around long enough to help with the tanks.
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_096<tab>Tu lui as dit que j'étais inquiet, et elle a explosé de rire<var 1D /var>!?<var 1D /var>... Bon, on va dire que c'est pas grave, du moment qu'elle va bien... et que ça reste entre nous<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_097<tab>But enough talk, let's get to work! Because if this doesn't go exactly accordin' to plan, we're done for! Oh gods...I'm not used to this sort of pressure!
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_097<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>... Cette fois, ça rigole plus. Va falloir que je bosse, jour et nuit. Plus de pause pipi ni de pause tout court<var 1D /var>! Rien que d'y penser... ça fait flipper...

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_100<tab>What do you think of the new, improved workshop? There's no way we can fail now, right? Actually, don't answer that...
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_100<tab>Ugh... Cette pression de malade... Je suis au bord de la crise d'angoisse...

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_101<tab>It won't take us anywhere near as long to build the other four tanks as it did the first, but we still have our work cut out for us. Might have to tell the others no sleep till we're done!
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_101<tab>M-mais non, j'ai pas le droit de me déballonner<var 1D /var>! Ma décision, faut que je l'assume jusqu'au bout, aussi bien pour moi que pour vous tous<var 1D /var>! Et tant pis si je finis avec des valises sous les yeux<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_102<tab>And don't go thinkin' that excludes you! I'm expectin' great things from you in the days leadin' up to Beardtide, so no slackin'!
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_RONITT_000_102<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, dis-moi que t'as la gnaque, toi aussi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_SYSTEM_000_103<tab>Watts's Anvil is now equipped with everything needed to produce Rolling Tankards en masse.
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_SYSTEM_000_103<tab>L'atelier du Garage Watts a été agrandi afin de permettre la production de chars en série.

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_SYSTEM_000_104<tab>But with the day of reckoning fast approaching, will Ronitt and his comrades be able to complete a column of tanks that meets Chief Xamott's exacting standards?
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_SYSTEM_000_104<tab>Ronitt a annoncé qu'il travaillerait sans relâche pour tenir son engagement, mais cela suffira-t-il<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_SYSTEM_000_110<tab>You have achieved <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Honored<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> reputation with Watts's Anvil.
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_SYSTEM_000_110<tab>Votre réputation auprès des Nains du Garage Watts est passée à “Émérite”.

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_SYSTEM_000_111<tab>New dwarf beast tribe daily quests are now available from Regitt at Watts's Anvil.
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_SYSTEM_000_111<tab>Vous pouvez désormais lancer de nouvelles quêtes quotidiennes en vous adressant à Regitt.

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_SYSTEM_000_112<tab>Furthermore, you will be able to undertake three additional quests from Regitt as a reputation bonus. This bonus is available until the daily reset time for beast tribe quests.
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_SYSTEM_000_112<tab>De plus, trois quêtes sup<var 16 /var>plé<var 16 /var>men<var 16 /var>tai<var 16 /var>res vous sont proposées, uniquement pendant la journée d'obtention de votre nouveau rang de réputation. Vous ne pouvez les accepter que dans la limite de votre quota quotidien.

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_SYSTEM_000_113<tab>These additional quests will become available after accepting all current daily quests from Regitt. Please be advised that you cannot undertake these quests if you have no remaining allowances.
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_SYSTEM_000_113<tab>Regitt vous les proposera après que vous aurez lancé celles qui étaient disponibles avant le gain de rang.

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_SYSTEM_000_114<tab>You now have access to a wider selection of wares from Mizutt.
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_SYSTEM_000_114<tab>En outre, Mizutt vous propose maintenant les objets correspondant au rang “Émérite”. Faites-en bon usage au cours de vos aventures<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_SYSTEM_000_120<tab>Normal-quality items crafted in the course of this quest serve no purpose and cannot be sold. It is recommended that you discard them.
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_SYSTEM_000_120<tab>Les objets de qualité normale fabriqués au cours de cette quête n'ayant aucune utilité et ne pouvant être vendus, il est recommandé de les jeter.

source: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_SYSTEM_000_121<tab>
target: TEXT_BANDWA004_03899_SYSTEM_000_121<tab>
